it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards

Class Weapon

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.Weapon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    WeaponAlternative, WeaponBase, WeaponOptional

    public abstract class Weapon
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    this class represent a single weapon
    See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • fire

        public void fire(java.util.ArrayList<TargetParameter> target)
          throws InvalidTargetException,
                 NoOwnerException
        this method uses all the effects in the attribute effect
        Parameters:
        target - are the targets of the fire
        Throws:
        InvalidTargetException - if at least one of the targets is invalid
        NoOwnerException - when in at least one of the targets there is not the owner or owner position

        utility method for measure the minimum between the targets and the effects
        Parameters:
        target - are the targets of the fire
        effectSize - the number of effects
        Returns:
        minimum between the targets and the effects
        Throws:
        InvalidTargetException - when there is no targets

      • fireOptional

        public abstract void fireOptional(java.util.ArrayList<TargetParameter> target,
                                  int which)
                           throws NotThisKindOfWeapon,
                                  InvalidTargetException,
                                  NoAmmoException,
                                  NoOwnerException
        apply the effects of the optional fire
        Parameters:
        target - are the targets of the fire
        which - which optional effect is going to be apply
        Throws:
        NotThisKindOfWeapon - this is not a optional weapon
        InvalidTargetException - if at least one of the targets is invalid
        NoAmmoException - the owner don't have enough ammo to pay this effect
        NoOwnerException - when in at least one of the targets there is not the owner or owner position

      • fireAlternative

        public abstract void fireAlternative(java.util.ArrayList<TargetParameter> target)
                              throws NotThisKindOfWeapon,
                                     InvalidTargetException,
                                     NoAmmoException,
                                     NoOwnerException
        apply the effects of the alternative mode
        Parameters:
        target - are the targets of the fire
        Throws:
        NotThisKindOfWeapon - this is not a optional weapon
        InvalidTargetException - if at least one of the targets is invalid
        NoAmmoException - the owner don't have enough ammo to pay this effect
        NoOwnerException - when in at least one of the targets there is not the owner or owner position
